title: How to Block Someone’s Number on Your Cell Phone

steps.title: Block a number on iPhone.
steps.content: Block a number on iPhone. According to Harris, it's fairly simple to block a number on your iPhone. You simply need to add numbers to a block list through the phone app. Use the following steps to do so: [1] X Research source Open the Phone app. Tap Recent , Contacts , or Voicemail . Tap the info icon with an "i" next to the number you want to block. Scroll down and tap Block Caller .

steps.title: Using the Google Phone app.
steps.content: Using the Google Phone app. Harris explains that if you have a stock Android device, such as a Google Pixel, you can block numbers using the Google Phone app. Use the following steps to do so: [2] X Research source Open the Phone app. Tap the icon with three dots ( ⋮ ) in the upper-right corner. Tap Call history . Tap a number you want to block. Tap Block/report spam .

steps.title: Block a number on a Samsung Galaxy.
steps.content: Block a number on a Samsung Galaxy. If you have a Samsung Galaxy phone, you can block calls using the Phone app. Use the following steps to do so: [3] X Research source Open the Phone app. Tap the icon with three dots ( ⋮ ) in the upper-right corner. Tap Settings . Tap Block numbers . Enter a phone number and tap the plus ( + ) icon.

steps.title: Use AT&T ActiveArmor.
steps.content: Use AT&T ActiveArmor. If AT&T is your provider, you can use an app called ActiveArmor to block numbers. You can create a personal list of blocked numbers using the free version of the app, or you can get the Advanced plan for 3.99 a month. Use the following steps to block a number using ActiveArmor: [4] X Research source Open the ActiveArmor app and go through the setup prompts if it's your first time. Tap Calls & Texts Tap Block Caller . Tap Call log , Contacts , or Number . Follow the prompts to block a caller. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Block calls with Verizon.
steps.content: Block calls with Verizon. Verizon allows you to temporarily block numbers for up to 90 days for free. You can permanently block up to 20 numbers using the Verizon Family app. Use the following steps to block a number using the Verizon: Using the My Verizon app: [6] X Research source Open the My Verizon app. Tap the Account tab at the bottom. Tap Manage or Manage devices below a number. Tap Block calls & messages . Enter the 10-digit number you want to block. Tap Block Number . Using the Verizon Family app: [7] X Research source Sign up for Verizon Family here . Download and install the Verizon Family app and set it up. Open the app and tap the Family Profiles tab. Tap Manage contacts . Tap Add new blocked number . Enter the 10-digit number. Tap Save .

steps.title: Call T-Mobile's customer service.
steps.content: Call T-Mobile's customer service. T-Mobile does not have a specific feature that allows you to block numbers. However, if you call customer service and request to speak to a representative, they may be able to block numbers for you depending on your plan and phone type. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Use star codes.
steps.content: Use star codes. You can use star codes to enable and disable certain features on both landline and cellular phones. You can also use it to block calls and numbers. Some star codes may not be available in certain areas or with certain carriers. [9] X Research source Dial *60 and hit the call button. Then, follow the instructions to either block the most recent call or a specific number. Dial *77 and hit the call button to block anonymous calls.

steps.title: Register for the National Do Not Call List.
steps.content: Register for the National Do Not Call List. If you're interested in blocking calls from salespeople and other spam calls, register for the National Do Not Call List. Registering is fairly simple. You just enter your number and e-mail. You should get an e-mail within 72 hours with instructions on how to complete your registration. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Block scam and spam calls through your carrier.
steps.content: Block scam and spam calls through your carrier. In addition to blocking specific numbers through your phone or mobile service provider, you can also block calls from numbers marked as scam or likely scam calls through your provider. AT&T Wireless: In addition to blocking specific numbers, AT&T Wireless customers can also use the ActiveArmor app to block spam and scam calls. Verizon: Verizon has a service called Call Filter, which you can use to block scam and spam calls. The service is free, but Call Filter Plus costs $3.99 a month and has more features. [11] X Research source T-Mobile: T-Mobile has a service called Scam Shield that costs $4 a month. With a subscription, you can block scam and spam calls using the Scam Shield app or the T-Life app on your mobile device. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Use Google Voice to block certain numbers from any device.
steps.content: Use Google Voice to block certain numbers from any device. If you want to block certain numbers from multiple phones and electronic devices, consider getting a Google Voice account. A Google Voice account will keep all your numbers and contacts in one account. You can easily block numbers through Google Voice. You can sign up for Google Voice for free if you live in the US. Log into your Google Voice account and find the number you want to block. [13] X Research source Select the check box next to the number. Hit "block." This will block this person from contacting you on any phone or electronic device hooked up to your Google Voice account. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Use phone apps for Android.
steps.content: Use phone apps for Android. Not all Android phones have specific tech you can use to block calls. However, Android offers many free or cheap apps that can be used to block numbers. [15] X Research source CallApp is a free app that comes with caller ID and allows you to block calls. Truecaller is an app that can detect and weed out spam calls. It also allows you to block specific numbers. There are many free apps on the app store that can be used to block calls. Browse apps and read reviews to find an app that works for your needs.

steps.title: Call your service provider.
steps.content: Call your service provider. Your service provider can block calls from reaching your number. Dial 611 to contact your cellular service provider. Ask them to block a number on your account.
